spec_data.Name: openqa-plugin-fedmsg
spec_data.Description:
This package contains an openQA plugin which sends fedmsgs for certain
openQA internal events. To enable it, put 'plugins = Fedmsg' in the
global section of /etc/openqa/openqa.ini. The plugin uses fedmsg-logger
to send messages, so fedmsg configuration determines where the message
goes. Note: the certificate prefix is hard coded to 'openqa' for now,
to send signed messages you must have an 'openqa' cert for fedmsg.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 17 Aug 2017 05:04:42 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
